snippet: A former president of Bucknell and the president of Drexel discuss the phenomenon.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In ''The Campus Tsunami'' (column, May 4), David Brooks argues that American higher education must deal with online education, embracing it as a tool to transmit inexpensive and global knowledge. He suggests that the test will be how online education can push higher education away from information transmission and up to higher things.

headline.main: As Elite Universities Embrace Online Learning
